Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.bootstrap

Class JcrNodeSynchronizer

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.bootstrap.JcrNodeSynchronizer
public final class JcrNodeSynchronizer extends Object
Handles JCR node synchronization between source and target trees.

Provides recursive node copying and synchronization with support for:

  • Property copying (single and multi-valued)
  • Mixin type preservation
  • Child node ordering for orderable node types
  • Primary type mismatch handling (replace vs sync)
Since:
5.2.0

      public static void syncProjectSite(Node standardRoot, Node projectRoot, String projectHstRoot) throws RepositoryException
      Synchronizes HST sites from standard root to project-specific root.
      Parameters:
      standardRoot - the source /hst:hst node
      projectRoot - the target /hst:projectname node
      projectHstRoot - the project root path (for logging)
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - if sync fails

      public static Node getOrAddChild(Node parent, String name, String primaryType) throws RepositoryException
      Gets or creates a child node with the given name and primary type.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent node
      name - the child node name
      primaryType - the primary type to use if creating
      Returns:
      the existing or newly created child node
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - if operation fails

    • syncNodeRecursively

      public static void syncNodeRecursively(Node source, Node target) throws RepositoryException
      Synchronizes a source node to a target node recursively.

      Copies all properties, mixins, and children from source to target. Handles primary type mismatches by replacing the target node.

      Parameters:
      source - the source node
      target - the target node
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - if sync fails

    • copyNodeRecursively

      public static void copyNodeRecursively(Node source, Node parent) throws RepositoryException
      Copies a source node recursively to a parent node.
      Parameters:
      source - the source node to copy
      parent - the parent node to copy into
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - if copy fails
